articles.title: Gun rights expanded in US after Supreme Court overturns NY handgun law - Sydney Morning Herald
articles.description: The Supreme Court said Americans have a right to carry firearms in public for self-defence, a ruling likely to lead to more people legally armed in cities and beyond.

articles.title: US Supreme Court says Americans have right to carry guns in public - Deccan Herald

articles.title: Scientists observe longitudinal plasmonic field in nanocavity at subnano-scale - Phys.org
